local_value: 0 - Fully active, able to carry on all pre-disease performance without restriction
omop_concept_name: Fully active, able to carry on all pre-disease performance without restriction

local_value: 1 - Restricted in physically strenous activity but ambulatory and able to carry out work of light and sedantary nature, e.g., light house work, office work
omop_concept_name: Restricted in physically strenuous activity but ambulatory and able to carry out work of a light or sedentary nature, e.g., light house work, office work

local_value: 2 - Ambulatory and capable of all self-care but unable to carry out any work activities. Up and about more than 50% of waking hours
omop_concept_name: Ambulatory and capable of all selfcare but unable to carry out any work activities. Up and about more than 50% of waking hours

local_value: 3 - Capable of only limited self-care, confined to bed or chair for more than 50% of waking hours
omop_concept_name: Capable of only limited selfcare, confined to bed or chair more than 50% of waking hours

local_value: 4 - Completely disabled. Cannot carry out any self-care. Totally confined to bed or chair
omop_concept_name: Completely disabled. Cannot carry on any selfcare. Totally confined to bed or chair
Fully active, able to carry on all pre-disease performance without restriction
Restricted in physically strenuous activity but ambulatory and able to carry out work of a light or sedentary nature, e.g., light house work, office work
Ambulatory and capable of all selfcare but unable to carry out any work activities. Up and about more than 50% of waking hours
Completely disabled. Cannot carry on any selfcare. Totally confined to bed or chair
